mainBoard.flavorText: Caught between life and death, between land and sea, between thought and oblivion.
mainBoard.name: Mire Triton
mainBoard.text:
Deathtouch
When Mire Triton enters, mill two cards and you gain 2 life. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

mainBoard.flavorText: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.
mainBoard.name: Cadaver Imp
mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Well, this can't be a good sign."
—Old Rutstein
mainBoard.name: Crow of Dark Tidings

rulings.text: The triggered ability triggers both when Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield and when it dies. You don't have to choose only one.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Its breath doesn't assault the senses. It pollutes the mind.
mainBoard.name: Miasmic Mummy

rulings.text: When Miasmic Mummy’s triggered ability resolves, first the player whose turn it is chooses a card to discard, then each other player in turn order chooses a card to discard, then all of those cards are discarded simultaneously. No one sees what the other players are discarding before deciding which card to discard.

mainBoard.text: When Miasmic Mummy enters, each player discards a card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa
mainBoard.name: Tithebearer Giant
mainBoard.text: When Tithebearer Giant enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

foreignData.name: Vasall des Erzdämons
foreignData.text:
Lebensverknüpfung (Schaden, der von dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, lässt dich entsprechend viele Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten.)
Wenn der Vasall des Erzdämons ins Spiel kommt und falls er aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel gekommen ist oder du ihn aus deinem Friedhof gewirkt hast, schicke ihn ins Exil. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen 5/5 schwarzen Dämon-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.name: Receptáculo del archidemonio
foreignData.text:
Vínculo vital. (El daño hecho por esta criatura también hace que ganes esa misma cantidad de vidas.)
Cuando el Receptáculo del archidemonio entre al campo de batalla, si entró desde tu cementerio o lo lanzaste desde tu cementerio, exílialo. Si lo haces, crea una ficha de criatura Demonio negra 5/5 con la habilidad de volar.

foreignData.name: Réceptacle de l'archifielleux
foreignData.text:
Lien de vie (Les blessures infligées par cette créature vous font aussi gagner autant de points de vie.)
Quand le Réceptacle de l'archifielleux arrive sur le champ de bataille, s'il est arrivé depuis votre cimetière ou que vous l'avez lancé depuis votre cimetière, exilez-le. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton de créature 5/5 noire Démon avec le vol.

foreignData.name: Intercessore del Supremo Demone
foreignData.text:
Legame vitale (Il danno inflitto da questa creatura ti fa anche guadagnare altrettanti punti vita.)
Quando l'Intercessore del Supremo Demone entra nel campo di battaglia, se è entrato dal tuo cimitero o l'hai lanciato dal tuo cimitero, esilialo. Se lo fai, crea una pedina creatura Demone 5/5 nera con volare.

foreignData.name: 魔王の器
foreignData.text:
絆魂（このクリーチャーがダメージを与えると、さらにあなたはその点数分のライフを得る。）
魔王の器が戦場に出たとき、これがあなたの墓地から出たかあなたがあなたの墓地からこれを唱えていた場合、これを追放する。そうしたなら、飛行を持つ黒の５/５のデーモン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

foreignData.name: 대마귀의 그릇
foreignData.text:
생명연결 (이 생물이 피해를 입히면, 당신은 그 피해만큼의 생명점을 얻는다.)
대마귀의 그릇이 전장에 들어올 때, 대마귀의 그릇이 당신의 무덤에서 전장에 들어왔거나 당신이 대마귀의 그릇을 당신의 무덤에서 발동했다면, 대마귀의 그릇을 추방한다. 그렇게 한다면, 비행을 가진 5/5 흑색 악마 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.name: Receptáculo do Arquidemônio
foreignData.text:
Vínculo com a vida (O dano causado por esta criatura também faz com que você ganhe uma quantidade equivalente de pontos de vida.)
Quando Receptáculo do Arquidemônio entrar no campo de batalha, se ele veio do seu cemitério ou você o conjurou do seu cemitério, exile-o. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha de criatura preta 5/5 do tipo Demônio com voar.

foreignData.name: Сосуд Архидемона
foreignData.text:
Цепь жизни (Повреждения, наносимые этим существом, также заставляют вас получить такое же количество жизней.)
Когда Сосуд Архидемона выходит на поле битвы, если он вышел из вашего кладбища или вы разыграли его из вашего кладбища, изгоните его. Если вы это делаете, создайте одну фишку существа 5/5 черный Демон с Полетом.

foreignData.name: 天魔祟体僧
foreignData.text:
系命（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）
当天魔祟体僧进战场时，若它是从你的坟墓场进战场或你是从你的坟墓场中施放它，则将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。

foreignData.name: 天魔祟體僧
foreignData.text:
繫命（此生物所造成的傷害會讓你獲得等量的生命。）
當天魔祟體僧進戰場時，若它是從你的墳墓場進戰場或你是從你的墳墓場中施放它，則將它放逐。若你如此作，則派出一個5/5黑色，具飛行異能的惡魔衍生生物。

mainBoard.name: Archfiend's Vessel
mainBoard.originalText:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
When Archfiend's Vessel enters the battlefield, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, exile it. If you do, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

rulings.text: If Archfiend's Vessel leaves the battlefield while its triggered ability is on the stack, you can't exile it from the zone it's put into, so you won't create a Demon.

mainBoard.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
When Archfiend's Vessel enters, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, exile it. If you do, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

foreignData.name: Blutschlemmer
foreignData.text:
Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Fliegend
Verursacht Trampelschaden (Diese Kreatur kann überschüssigen Kampfschaden dem verteidigenden Spieler oder Planeswalker zufügen.)
Wenn der Blutschlemmer ins Spiel kommt, opfert jeder Gegner eine Kreatur.

foreignData.name: Goremet
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica una criatura.
Vuela.
Arrolla. (Esta criatura puede hacer el daño de combate sobrante al jugador o planeswalker al que ataca.)
Cuando el Goremet entre al campo de batalla, cada oponente sacrifica una criatura.

foreignData.name: Gourmet d'entrailles
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez une créature.
Vol
Piétinement (Cette créature peut infliger son surplus de blessures de combat au joueur ou au planeswalker qu'elle attaque.)
Quand le Gourmet d'entrailles arrive sur le champ de bataille, chaque adversaire sacrifie une créature.

foreignData.name: Macabro Buongustaio
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica una creatura.
Volare
Travolgere (Questa creatura può infliggere il danno da combattimento in eccesso al giocatore o al planeswalker che sta attaccando.)
Quando il Macabro Buongustaio entra nel campo di battaglia, ogni avversario sacrifica una creatura.

foreignData.name: 大殺漢
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。
飛行
トランプル（このクリーチャーは余剰の戦闘ダメージを、これが攻撃しているプレイヤーかプレインズウォーカーに与えることができる。）
大殺漢が戦場に出たとき、各対戦相手はそれぞれクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

foreignData.name: 선혈 대식가
foreignData.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
비행
돌진 (이 생물은 여분의 전투피해를 공격 중인 플레이어 또는 플레인즈워커에게 입힐 수 있다.)
선혈 대식가가 전장에 들어올 때, 각 상대는 생물 한 개를 희생한다.

foreignData.name: Gourmet de Vísceras
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, sacrifique uma criatura.
Voar
Atropelar (Esta criatura pode causar seu dano de combate excedente ao jogador ou planeswalker que ela estiver atacando.)
Quando Gourmet de Vísceras entra no campo de batalha, cada oponente sacrifica uma criatura.

foreignData.name: Кровожадный Гурман
foreignData.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания пожертвуйте существо.
Полет
Пробивной удар (Это существо может нанести избыточные боевые повреждения игроку или planeswalker'у, которого атакует.)
Когда Кровожадный Гурман выходит на поле битвы, каждый оппонент жертвует существо.

foreignData.name: 嗜血餮魔
foreignData.text:
牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
飞行
践踏（此生物造成之过量战斗伤害能对所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）
当嗜血餮魔进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物。

foreignData.name: 嗜血餮魔
foreignData.text:
犧牲一個生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
飛行
踐踏（此生物造成之過量戰鬥傷害能對所攻擊的玩家或鵬洛客造成之。）
當嗜血餮魔進戰場時，每位對手各犧牲一個生物。

mainBoard.name: Goremand
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Flying
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Goremand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: As Goremand's triggered ability resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it's an opponent's turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses a creature they control, then each other opponent in turn order does the same knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Flying
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Goremand enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Even the rats refuse to set foot inside. I fear to think what might be waiting in there."
—Gravedigger's journal

foreignData.flavorText:
„Selbst die Ratten setzen keinen Fuß hinein. Ich fürchte mich vor dem, was da drinnen lauern könnte."
—Tagebuch eines Totengräbers
foreignData.name: Kryptenlauerer
foreignData.text: Wenn der Kryptenlauerer ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreatur opfern oder eine Kreaturenkarte abwerfen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ni siquiera las ratas osan entran. Me da miedo pensar en lo que hay dentro".
—Diario del sepulturero
foreignData.name: Acechador de la cripta
foreignData.text: Cuando el Acechador de la cripta entre al campo de batalla, puedes sacrificar una criatura o descartar una carta de criatura. Si lo haces, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Même les rats refusent d'y entrer. Je n'ose pas imaginer ce qui se trouve là-dedans. »
—Journal du fossoyeur
foreignData.name: Guetteur de la crypte
foreignData.text: Quand le Guetteur de la crypte arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez sacrifier une créature ou vous défausser d'une carte de créature. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Perfino i topi si rifiutano di metterci piede. Tremo al solo pensiero di cosa possa nascondersi là dentro."
—Diario di uno scavatombe
foreignData.name: Predatore della Cripta
foreignData.text: Quando il Predatore della Cripta entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi sacrificare una creatura o scartare una carta creatura. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「ネズミですら中に入ることを嫌がる。中に何がいるのか考えるだけでも恐ろしい。」
――墓堀り人の日誌
foreignData.name: 墓所に潜むもの
foreignData.text: 墓所に潜むものが戦場に出たとき、あなたは、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げるかクリーチャー・カード１枚を捨ててもよい。そうしたなら、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ホラー

foreignData.flavorText:
"쥐들조차도 발을 들이려 하지 않아. 저 안에 뭐가 도사리고 있는지 생각하는 것조차 무섭군."
—무덤 도둑의 일지
foreignData.name: 묘지 잠복꾼
foreignData.text: 묘지 잠복꾼이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생물 한 개를 희생하거나 생물 카드 한 장을 버릴 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Até os ratos se recusam a pôr os pés ali dentro. Tenho medo só de pensar no que pode estar esperando ali."
— Diário do coveiro
foreignData.name: Espreitador da Cripta
foreignData.text: Quando Espreitador da Cripta entra no campo de batalha, você pode sacrificar uma criatura ou descartar um card de criatura. Se fizer isso, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Даже крысы туда не суются. Мне страшно подумать, кто мог там притаиться».
— дневник могильщика
foreignData.name: Хищник из Склепа
foreignData.text: Когда Хищник из Склепа выходит на поле битвы, вы можете пожертвовать существо или сбросить карту существа. Если вы это делаете, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText:
「就连老鼠都不敢进去。我甚至都不敢去想里面会有什么在等着我。」
～掘墓人日志
foreignData.name: 墓穴伏怪
foreignData.text: 当墓穴伏怪进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物或弃一张生物牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText:
「就連老鼠都不敢進去。我甚至都不敢去想裡面會有什麼在等著我。」
～掘墓人日誌
foreignData.name: 墓穴伏怪
foreignData.text: 當墓穴伏怪進戰場時，你可以犧牲一個生物或棄一張生物牌。若你如此作，則抽一張牌。

mainBoard.name: Crypt Lurker
mainBoard.originalText: When Crypt Lurker enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.

rulings.text: Crypt Lurker can be sacrificed to pay the cost of its own triggered ability.
While resolving Crypt Lurker's ability, you can't sacrifice more than one creature, discard more than one card, or do both to draw more than one card.

mainBoard.text: When Crypt Lurker enters, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.

mainBoard.name: Reanimate

rulings.text: If a card in a player's graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If any abilities trigger on the creature entering the battlefield, those abilities resolve after you lose life. If losing life results in you losing the game, those abilities won't resolve.
In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, the creature you control from Reanimate is exiled.
The amount of life you lose is determined by the mana value of the card in your graveyard, not the creature once it's on the battlefield.
You lose life after the creature is already on the battlefield. Any abilities it has that interact with loss of life, such as that of Platinum Emperion, apply to that loss of life.

mainBoard.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

mainBoard.flavorText: Funerary masks help the newly dead resist the erosion of memory and identity in the Underworld.
mainBoard.name: Funeral Rites
mainBoard.text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then mill two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I love those who are eager to serve."
—Liliana Vess

foreignData.flavorText:
„Ich liebe alle, die mir dienen wollen."
—Liliana Vess
foreignData.name: Wiederauferstehen
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Me encantan quienes se mueren por servirme".
—Liliana Vess
foreignData.name: Alzarse de nuevo
foreignData.text: Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.

foreignData.flavorText:
« J'aime ceux qui sont désireux de servir. »
—Liliana Vess
foreignData.name: Revenir des morts
foreignData.text: Renvoyez une carte de créature ciblée sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Adoro gli schiavi ansiosi di mettersi al mio servizio."
—Liliana Vess
foreignData.name: Risorgere
foreignData.text: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText:
「熱心に仕えてくれる人って好きよ。」
――リリアナ・ヴェス
foreignData.name: 再命
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それを戦場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText:
"나는 적극적으로 섬기려 하는 것들을 사랑하지."
—릴리아나 베스
foreignData.name: 소생시키기
foreignData.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Eu adoro os que mal podem esperar para servir."
— Liliana Vess
foreignData.name: Reerguer-se
foreignData.text: Devolva o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Мне нравятся те, кто так стремится мне услужить».
— Лилиана Весс
foreignData.name: Восстать Вновь
foreignData.text: Верните целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.

foreignData.flavorText:
「我喜欢这些热切想要效命的家伙。」
～莉莲娜维斯
foreignData.name: 再度起身
foreignData.text: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreignData.flavorText:
「我喜歡這些熱切想要效命的傢伙。」
～莉蓮娜維斯
foreignData.name: 再度起身
foreignData.text: 將目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

mainBoard.name: Rise Again
mainBoard.originalText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
mainBoard.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Grausamkeit? Pah. Das ist eine Notwendigkeit."
—Kaervek
foreignData.name: Eliminieren
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 3 oder weniger.

foreignData.flavorText:
"¿Crueldad? No. Esto es necesidad".
—Kaervek
foreignData.name: Eliminar
foreignData.text: Destruye la criatura o planeswalker objetivo con coste de maná convertido de 3 o menos.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Cruel ? Non. C'est nécessaire. »
—Kærvek
foreignData.name: Éliminer
foreignData.text: Détruisez une cible, créature ou planeswalker, dont le coût converti de mana est inférieur ou égal à 3.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Crudeltà? No. Questa è necessità."
—Kaervek
foreignData.name: Liquidare
foreignData.text: Distruggi una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 3.

foreignData.flavorText:
「残虐だと？そうではない。必要なのだ。」
――ケアヴェク
foreignData.name: 取り除き
foreignData.text: 点数で見たマナ・コストが３以下の、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText:
"잔인함? 아니. 이건 필요함이야."
—케어벡
foreignData.name: 제거
foreignData.text: 전환마나비용이 3 이하인 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Crueldade? Não. Necessidade."
— Kaervek
foreignData.name: Sumir
foreignData.text: Destrua a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 3.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Жестокость? Отнюдь. Просто необходимость».
— Кайервек
foreignData.name: Изничтожить
foreignData.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо или planeswalker'а с конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 3.

foreignData.flavorText:
「残忍？错。这是必然。」
～凯雷威克
foreignData.name: 涤除
foreignData.text: 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客，且其总法术力费用须等于或小于3。

foreignData.flavorText:
「殘忍？錯。這是必然。」
～凱雷威克
foreignData.name: 滌除
foreignData.text: 消滅目標生物或鵬洛客，且其總魔法力費用須等於或小於3。

mainBoard.name: Eliminate
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 3 or less.

rulings.text: If a creature or planeswalker on the battlefield has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
The mana value of a token that isn't a copy of another object is 0. A token that is a copy of another object has the same mana cost as that object.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.

mainBoard.flavorText: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Moor
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Moor enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
